resources.string: You have no games! Click add (+) to add a new game!

1. To add a game, simply click the plus (+) button and fill out your game details.
 2. You can later edit a game by clicking on the game and changing the game's details.
 3. We hope you enjoy playing and keeping track of your games!
Welcome! Good to meet you and get to know you here. I am very happy you are playing our game today!
